product_name: Dove Deep Moisture Body Care Bundle
key_features: Gentle formula designed for everyday use
Easy routine with body wash + lotion
description: A daily body care bundle designed to keep skin feeling soft, comfortable, and cared for every day.

faqs.is_it_for_dry_skin: Yes, it is commonly chosen for moisture support.
faqs.can_i_use_daily: Yes, it is designed for daily use.
faqs.is_it_gentle_on_skin: Yes, it uses mild cleansing ingredients.
faqs.does_it_have_a_strong_fragrance: No, the fragrance is light and subtle.
faqs.can_it_be_used_by_all_skin_types: Yes, it suits most skin types.
